author: SFENCE

game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: hades_revisited
game.short_description: Work in Progress. You have stranded on the planet Hades. Use your limited supplies to survive and use terraforming to create a beautiful habitable place. (EARLY TEST VERSION)
game.title: Hades Revisited

long_description:
[Shared forum topic](https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?t=26747)

Modpack of some mods with non-GPL license modified for subgame [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/). Check mods in pack for license.
Included:

* hades_default -> Some function from origin Minetest game default mod, required for easier porting of mods for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/) subgame.
* hades_bucket -> Like normal bucket, but cannot be emptied (to don't change one of main idea of [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/) subgame)
* hades_xpanes -> Mod xpanes from origin Minetest game mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/) subgame.
* hades_digtron -> [digtron](https://content.minetest.net/packages/FaceDeer/digtron/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_moretools ->  [moretools](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/moretools/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_clothing ->  [clothing](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/clothing/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/) (use with  [hades_skinsdb](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/hades_skinsdb/) ).
* hades_glass_stained -> Mod [glass_stained](https://content.minetest.net/packages/v-rob/glass_stained/) modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_animal-> [mobs_animal](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mobs_animal/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_horse -> [mob_horse](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mob_horse/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_extrafarming -> [farming](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/farming/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_craftguide2 -> [craftguide](https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?t=14088&hilit=craftguide) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_moreblocks -> [moreblocks](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Calinou/moreblocks/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_rocks -> [rocks](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Just_Visiting/rocks/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_castle_masonry -> [castle_masonry](https://content.minetest.net/packages/FaceDeer/castle_masonry/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_castle_gates -> [castle_gates](https://content.minetest.net/packages/FaceDeer/castle_gates/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_castle_lighting -> [castle_lighting](https://content.minetest.net/packages/FaceDeer/castle_lighting/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_boost_cart -> [boost_cart](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Krock/boost_cart/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
* hades_extravessels -> replace of some vessels removed from Hades Revisited, but used by  mods like [Paleotest for Hades Revisited](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/hades_paleotest/) and [Farming for Hades Revisited](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/hades_extensionmods/).
*  hades_extramaterials -> [basic_materials](https://content.minetest.net/packages/VanessaE/basic_materials/) mod modified for [Hades Revisited.](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Wuzzy/hades_revisited/).
name: hades_extensionmods
short_description: Pack of mods for subgame Hades Revisited.
title: Mods pack for Hades Revisited
